title: Computer Mania
description: It s a computer parts website created using Tailwind CSS and Daizy UI integrated with MongoDB where users can order computer parts and pay, update profile, add reviews, and admin can add parts, make admins, etc
points: Users can sign up and log in using email-password or google. Anyone without access cannot go to some pages without logging in, which is developed by React Router and firebase authentication
The Dashboard is different for Users and Admins
Users can place orders, see/her order list and cancel or pay for it, update profiles, and give a review
Admin can see all orders of the users. They can add a new product, make a new admin, cancel an order, change order status, and so on

title: Fruit Warehouse
description: It's an inventory management website created using Bootstrap and integrated with MongoDB where users can deliver and restock fruits and hence, update the quantity. A user can also add items or delete items, etc
points: Users can sign up and log in using email-password or google.
Anyone without access cannot go to some pages without logging in, which is developed by React Router and firebase authentication.
An user can also see only the items he or she had added before
Users can see all the items, add an item, delete an item update the item quantity by delivering or restocking it
Pagination is available in inventory items and my items for a more optimized user experience.

title: Cloth's Heaven
description: It s a small project created using bootstrap and typescript where users can see some reviews on the home page and see all the reviews if they want to
points: The Header is created using react router and the links are designed without using any framework
There are two charts, Bar chart and Composed chart in the dashboard route created using rechart
Implemented 404 route and the whole project is created using typescript
